```{r include = FALSE}
# load libraries
library(data.table)
library(SpatialEpiApp)
```

```{r}
# format data
case_raw <- fread("case_shiny.csv")
pop <- fread("population_sev.csv")

case <-
  case_raw %>%
  left_join(pop) %>%
  mutate(date = 2004,
         NAME_1 = Oblast)

fwrite(case, "case_shiny_final.csv")
```
